name: Calamity 1: The Natural World
description:
Front of Sleeve - PlayStation (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Mona and Moki are transported back in time by Jules Verne's time machine and meet both Mr. Verne and the real Calamity Jane! To help our heroes get back home, your child will read articles about various environments such as the forest, the desert, the ocean, and the arctic, and then answer questions about what they have read. So pack your literary picnic basket for a wild ride across some of the world's most fascinating landscapes!

Learning objectives:
  • Use reading strategies to answer questions
  • Use contextual clues to understand text meaning
  • Analyze words containing Greek or Latin roots, prefixes, or suffixes
  • Learn new vocabulary words
  • Understand and solve analogies and riddles
  • Identify the main idea
  • Learn about the ocean, deserts, forests, and polar regions
